content: Lifestyle Marriage Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Oct 2018What are some good places to propose to your girlfriend to be your wife?Affordable and Creative ideas only.6 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (6)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 05 Apr 2019A place that is special only to the both of you!It doesn't need to be expensive or extravagant. It needs to be meaningful.If however she is in fact looking for it to be ultra expensive/extravagant, then I guess you would also need to think about whether values about money are aligned.0 comments1
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 10 Oct 2018Singapore flyer, gardens by the bay0 comments1

Jeff Yeo,   amateur Social contributor  at School of social sharingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Oct 2018staycation overseas holiday ultimately it is also important to know what she prefers a large public proposal or something private good luck 0 comments0
Nicholas ChanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 10 Oct 2018With family & friends? 0 comments0

Ck ChaiLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Oct 2018Pls try to find out your gf's ideal proposal and her thoughts well enough before action.  While most gals always touched to tears on videos of public proposal, I have gfs telling me they do NOT look forward to such proposal as it is too attention seeking and it is more like peer pressure that they should agree to it.​Find a place which is meaningful for both of you, e.g. the venue you first met or first date. Other places will be at the chalet, gathering family and friends to plan for the surprise or a surprise proposal during an overseas trip. ​If your gf is someone who love little surprise, can do up a scrapbook album, compiling photos of your dating journey and journal down your thoughts towards her and your vision for future.0 comments0

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 10 Oct 2018Buy ticket in advance and go to the country you both like as the usual vacations but proposed in that countrie's them park or garden of choice. Just the 2 of you and ask the venue operators for small favour to help make it special without spending $.0 comments0
